en-US: Due to way too many spam accounts, we have enabled a Captcha Verification for applying to the group. After sending the invite application, please wait for a while and there should be a bot DMing you with a Captcha. Please complete the Captcha and you will be added to the group. If you didn't complete the Captcha after a period of time, your application will be rejected, and if you somehow entered the group without completing the Captcha, the bot will kick you out. We apologize for the inconvenience. If you have any problems resolving the Captcha, please contact the admins (Username: @iNKORE_Support).
zh-CN: 由于有太多的垃圾账户，我们已经为申请加入群组启用了验证码验证。发送邀请申请后，请等待一段时间，应该会有一个机器人给您发送验证码。请完成验证码，然后您将被添加到群组中。如果您在一段时间后分钟内没有完成验证码，您的申请将被拒绝，如果您以某种方式进入了群组而没有完成验证码，机器人将把您踢出。对此给您带来的不便，我们深感抱歉。如果您在解决验证码时遇到任何问题，请联系管理员 (用户名：@iNKORE_Support)。
